segments.text: Hello.This is room 1205.Our message lamp is flaming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry to have kept you waiting.Mr.Jones needs a telephone call from you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you bring the message to my room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid we have nobody available at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then I'll come down and pick up the message immediately .
segments.speaker: S1
